Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Builder \Build"er\, n. One who builds; one whose occupation is to build, as a carpenter, a shipwright, or a mason. [1913 Webster]
In the practice of civil architecture, the builder comes between the architect who designs the work and the artisans who execute it. --Eng. Cyc. [1913 Webster]

builder n 1: a substance added to soaps or detergents to increase their cleansing action [syn: {detergent builder}] 2: someone who contracts for and supervises construction (as of a building) [syn: {constructor}]
